metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000203 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ROOT version 6.9.03 and below is vulnerable to an authenticated shellmetacharacter injection in the rootd daemon resulting in remote codeexecution

criterions.comment: root-system: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
